title: Account deleting
body: Is there any way to have riot delete an account cause i have an accout that hasnt been used in forever and the only thing i remember for it is the email

replies.body: We can look into this for you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help.  You may need to verify ownership of the account, and we'll respond asap with those details!
how long does it normally take for a support ticket response
